# BergHaus Hotel Management System - Food & Beverage Module

## Project Overview
This is a Food & Beverage Management module for BergHaus Hotel Management System built with:
- Frontend: Next.js with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS
- Backend: Express.js with Node.js
- Database: MongoDB with Mongoose ODM
- Authentication: JWT with bcrypt

## Key Features
- Dynamic menu management
- Real-time order tracking
- Guest ordering system
- Kitchen staff interface
- Inventory integration
- Sales and waste reporting
- Role-based access control

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Follow REST API conventions
- Implement proper error handling
- Use environment variables for configuration
- Follow component-based architecture
- Ensure responsive design
